Header.title: Welcome to New Epoch Recruitment
Header.paragraph: Specialists in Engineering, Surveying & Planning Recruitment Across New Zealand & Australia

About.paragraph: Specialists in our sector with strong industry knowledge, we truly care about our valued reputation as a consultative, trusted and reliable recruitment agency who strives to get the best outcomes for all parties.
Why: Proven expertise across engineering, surveying and planning roles
Tailored recruitment solutions that meet your business needs
Strong relationships built on honesty and transparency
Focused on long-term success for both clients and candidates
Why2: Extensive network of domestic and international professionals
Direct communication with a dedicated specialist consultant
Efficient processes designed to save you time and resources
Committed to providing a seamless recruitment experience

Services.name: Permanent Recruitment
Services.text: We connect employers with highly skilled engineering, surveying and planning professionals for long-term, strategic hires.

Services.name: Contract & Temporary Staffing
Services.text: Flexible contract professionals ready to support short-term projects, workload peaks or specialised assignments.

Services.name: Technical & Specialist Roles
Services.text: Recruiting for hard-to-find technical positions across civil, structural, geotech, planning, transport, environmental and more.

Services.name: Senior & Leadership Appointments
Services.text: Targeted search for senior engineers, team leaders, discipline managers and other key leadership roles.

Services.name: Surveying & Planning Recruitment
Services.text: Connecting firms with cadastral surveyors, planners, technicians and specialists across NZ and Australia.

Services.name: Talent Pipeline & Market Insights
Services.text: Gain actionable insights into market trends, candidate availability, salary expectations and workforce planning.

Features.title: Nationwide Coverage
Features.text: We work with engineering, surveying and planning talent across New Zealand and Australia, supporting organisations of all sizes.

Features.title: Specialist Industry Knowledge
Features.text: Your vacancy is managed directly by a specialist consultant from start to finish—no handovers, no delegation.

Features.title: No Placement, No Cost
Features.text: We operate on a success-based model. If we don’t find the right fit, you don’t pay.

Features.title: Extensive Candidate Network
Features.text: Access to a strong domestic and international network of qualified engineering, surveying and planning professionals.
